InvalidParameterException(java.lang.Stri.Description: Constructs an InvalidParameterException with the specified detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

InvalidParameterException().Description: Constructs an InvalidParameterException with no detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

ClassDesc: This exception, designed for use by the JCA/JCE engine classes, is thrown when an invalid parameter is passed to a method.
